name: BasilMarket - Halloween Theme
description:
BasilMarket - Halloween Theme

***************************************************************
The Theme
***************************************************************
Features of my BasilMarket - Halloween Theme include:
• New banner
• New background
• New headers
• Translucent/highlight menus
• New post gradient
• New buttons
• Changed Text colours
• Changed Sticky colours

Here is a preview of my theme. (Its a big picture, so it might take a while to load)
http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo142/Dumbfugi/BasilMarket%20-%20Halloween%20Theme/preview.png

***************************************************************
Change Log
***************************************************************
08-10-22
• Release of theme - Homepage, Screens, Videos, all sections under BasilID menu
• Fixed Top Message font colour, fixed mail page
08-10-22
• Fixed Safari and Internet Explorer style sheet problems
08-10-22
• Finished all Monster pages
• Finished all Item and Auction pages
• Finished all sections under the Maple Story menu
• Fixed small font issues
• Finished all Forum pages
08-10-23
• Fixed My Threads, My Posts, and New Posts headers
• Fixed Search Results page
08-10-24
• Fixed BasilID Screens tab
08-10-25
• Fixed Monster page stat background
08-10-31
• Fixed Edit Wishlist headers
08-11-01
• Changed New Mail background in BasilID menu
08-11-09
• Fixed Posting Suspension background
08-11-15
• Fixed Outbid Notice on My Auctions page
08-11-18
• Fixed BasilID Videos background

*******************************************************************************************
View my Other BasilMarket Themes/Tweaks on my userpage here: user 15894

discussions.name: LOVE THE THEME, looks very good and no glitches! N
